text: Arthur Anderson (August 29, 1922 - April 9, 2016) was an American movie, television, stage, radio, and voice actor. His career began on radio during the early 1930s. Anderson was known for his voice role as Eustace Bagge in Courage the Cowardly Dog. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:People from Albany, New York
title: Arthur Anderson
